label_address_placeholder1: Enter the street name, house number
header_title_room_type: Choose how many rooms in the apartment
payment_question: Can you currently accept online payments?
card_tip1_service_add_later: Do not worry. We have only listed a few of them. You can add, edit or delete any service from the control panel within your profile.
card_tip1__service_missing2: You can then add different regulations and restrictions for your customers to avoid possible inconvenience situations or problems with the neighborhood or condominium regulations.
card_tips__step1: It is a good opportunity to name your property. The name will be visible to tourists and will help you manage multiple businesses using a single account.
card_tips_point2__step1: 2. try not to let your fantasies go free
select_class__step1: Select the class of accommodation you offer
card_tips__step2: Choose the location on the map where your business is located. This location will be visible to tourists and it will be easier for them to find you.
card_tips_point__step2: Move the map until the cursor matches your address.
detail_card_tip1__step2: Does the address match your property?
detail_card_tip2__step2: You can change it or add names for condominiums or other information that will help tourists find you.
card_tips__step3: Describe your business indicating all the spaces and the destination of these. Add the rooms, number of places and the type of beds. Don't forget the spaces such as balconies, gardens or common areas of great interest to your guests.
detail_tip1__step3: Please indicate the name, quantity and type of beds available in this room.
detail_tip2__step3: The information will be visible to tourists on the profile page of your business, and will allow them to get a clear idea before leaving on vacation.
card_tip_title__step5: You do not have a photo?
card_tip__step5: No problem. You can skip this step and add them later in your profile menu.
card_tips_title__step6: Not sure what price to set?
card_tips__step6: No problem. From your profile you can set the prices you want based on the day, period or seasonality. You can set different prices for weekdays, holidays, weekends or for the whole week.
price_question__step6: What price do you want to indicate for a note?
price_answer__step6: It is just a test just to make you understand how our platform and commission policy works
payment_info__step7: Tourists will be able to pay by credit cards, bank transfers, Sepa or use virtual wallets such as Apple Pay, Google Pay, ect and the money arrives directly to your bank account.
detail_card_choose__step7: Choose which credit cards you currently accept
detail2_card_tips2__step7: No problem. You can set up different tools from your profile that allow your customers to buy your products or services online and the money goes straight to your account.
detail2_payment_title__step7: Allow your guests to pay through Go Cervinia and our partners
detail2_payment_text__step7: Regarding transactions and money exchanges We, like most market places and platforms of online tourism products, apologize to our Partner to the
detail2_payment_text2__step7: system because it is one of the safest and most convenient solutions for our customers.
detail2_offline_method1__step7: A tourist books a vacation or service on Go Cervinia.
detail2_offline_method2__step7: The tourist is charged or freezes the amount according to your preferences and we make sure that the tourist pays the full amount before check-in or deadline.
card_tips__step8: If you are not satisfied with the result, don't worry. You can customize your page from your profile by adding, modifying, or deleting any information.
info_card_text1__step9: If you have more apartments in this section you can add them or double them if the apartments are of the same category.
info_card_text2__step9: In any case, later from your profile you can customize them one by one.
info_card_settings__step9: Communication methods and notification settings can be changed from your profile.
appartment_location_same__step9: The apartments are located in the same address
appartment_location_different__step9: The apartments are located in different addresses
same_type__step9: More apartments of the same type

info_card__step12: Adesso puoi accedere al tuo profilo e scoprire tutti i strumenti e le possibilità per la tua attività.
congrats__step12: Congratulazioni! Ti sei registrato con successo.
card__checkbox1__step12: Dichiaro che la mia attività e provista di tutte le licenze e permessi necessari per svolgere il tipo di attività che publico su www.gocervinia.com. E questi possono essere mostrati su richiesta da parte nostra. Go Cervinia si prende il diritto di verifica e aprofondimento sulle informazioni da voi rilasciate nel momento della registrazione.
card__checkbox2__step12: Dichiaro che o leto e sono a conoscenza con
secutiry__step13: Per la sicureza dei dati e per protegere il vostro account abbiamo impostato il metodo di autentificazione in 2 fattori. In questo modo ogni volta che entrate nel vostro account vi arrivera un sms con un codice che dovete inserirlo insieme alla vostra password.
verify_enter_phone: Inserisci il numero di telefono che volete allegare al vostro profilo
step13_info1: For data security and to protect your account we have set the 2-factor authentication method. In this way, every time you log into your account you will receive a text message with a code that you must enter together with your password.
step13_info2: Enter the phone number you want to attach to your profile
card_tips_title__step20: Not sure which option to choose?
card_tips_text__step20: From your profile you can set all the available methods to be able to receive payments online. You can also set the policy of payments and penalties.
pay_text__step20: Tourists will be able to pay by credit cards, bank transfers, Sepa or use virtual wallets such as Apple Pay, Google Pay, ect and the money arrives directly to your bank account.
